widget.text:
This statemachine is setup in a strange way because of the way roasting non marshmallow things works on the campfire.
Ideally the non marshmallow sie of the asm would look the same as the marshmallow side but there are differences in how they are implemented.
Marshmallows don't actually produce any food, and therefore aren't a part of the crafting system.
Everything else does produce plates of food so they are a part of the crafting system. However these interactions don't use ICO's so they don't work the same way as most of the other crafting system.
The two major differences are we don't use the carry system at all to handle the stick, and the second is that since we aren't using ICO's it's much harder to pass along the animation context.
What this means is that at the end of the loop state we always have to drop the stick in order to multi-task and both of the finish states need to be accessed directly from entry without going through start (otherwise you pull out a non existent stick before actually finishing).
